name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench, grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width, lower to chest, press up.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, grip bar wider than shoulders, lower to upper chest, press up.

name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Set bench to decline, grip bar wider than shoulders, lower to lower chest, press up.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on flat bench with dumbbells, press up and slightly inward, lower with control.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, press dumbbells up from shoulders.

name: Decline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to decline, press dumbbells up from lower chest.

name: Dumbbell Fly
instructions: Lie on bench, arms extended with slight bend, lower dumbbells in arc to sides, squeeze back up.

name: Incline Dumbbell Fly
instructions: Set bench to incline, perform fly motion targeting upper chest.

name: Cable Crossover
instructions: Set cables high, step forward, bring handles together in front of chest with slight bend in elbows.

name: Low Cable Crossover
instructions: Set cables low, bring handles up and together in front of upper chest.

name: Machine Chest Press
instructions: Sit with back against pad, grip handles, press forward, return with control.

name: Pec Deck Fly
instructions: Sit with back against pad, forearms on pads, bring arms together in front.

name: Push-Up
instructions: Hands shoulder-width apart, lower chest to ground, push back up maintaining straight body.

name: Diamond Push-Up
instructions: Form diamond shape with hands under chest, perform push-up.

name: Dips (Chest)
instructions: Lean forward on parallel bars, lower body until stretch in chest, press up.

name: Barbell Row
instructions: Hinge at hips, pull bar to lower chest/upper abs, squeeze shoulder blades.

name: Pendlay Row
instructions: Start with bar on floor, explosively row to lower chest, return to floor each rep.

name: T-Bar Row
instructions: Straddle bar, row handle to chest, squeeze back at top.

name: Dumbbell Row
instructions: One knee and hand on bench, row dumbbell to hip, lower with control.

name: Chest Supported Row
instructions: Lie face down on incline bench, row dumbbells to sides.

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Sit upright, pull handle to torso, squeeze shoulder blades, extend arms.

name: Single Arm Cable Row
instructions: Stand facing cable, pull handle to side, rotate torso slightly.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Grip bar wider than shoulders, pull to upper chest, squeeze lats.

name: Close Grip Lat Pulldown
instructions: Use close grip handle, pull to chest, focus on lat contraction.

name: Straight Arm Pulldown
instructions: Stand facing high cable, arms straight, pull bar down to thighs.

name: Pull-Up
instructions: Grip bar overhand wider than shoulders, pull chin over bar, lower with control.

name: Chin-Up
instructions: Grip bar underhand shoulder-width, pull chin over bar.

name: Neutral Grip Pull-Up
instructions: Grip parallel handles, pull up until chin clears hands.

name: Machine Row
instructions: Sit with chest against pad, pull handles to sides, squeeze back.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width, grip bar, drive through heels, extend hips and knees together.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hold bar at hips, hinge forward with slight knee bend, feel hamstring stretch, return.

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Wide stance, toes out, grip bar between legs, drive up.

name: Rack Pull
instructions: Set bar at knee height in rack, deadlift from this position.

name: Barbell Shrug
instructions: Hold bar at thighs, shrug shoulders straight up toward ears.

name: Dumbbell Shrug
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, shrug shoulders up, hold briefly at top.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Set cable at face height, pull rope to face with elbows high, externally rotate.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Grip bar at shoulders, press overhead, lock out at top.

name: Seated Overhead Press
instructions: Sit with back supported, press bar from shoulders overhead.

name: Push Press
instructions: Slight knee dip, explosively drive bar overhead using leg drive.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Press dumbbells from shoulders to overhead, palms facing forward.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Start with palms facing you, rotate and press up, reverse on the way down.

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Raise dumbbells out to sides until parallel to floor, lower with control.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand side to cable, raise arm out to side until parallel.

name: Front Raise
instructions: Raise dumbbells in front to shoulder height, lower with control.

name: Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Bent over, raise dumbbells out to sides, squeeze rear delts.

name: Reverse Pec Deck
instructions: Face into pec deck, push handles back and out, squeeze rear delts.

name: Machine Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit with back against pad, press handles overhead.

name: Upright Row
instructions: Narrow grip on bar, pull up along body to chest height, elbows high.

name: Dumbbell Upright Row
instructions: Pull dumbbells up along body, elbows leading.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Grip bar shoulder-width, curl to shoulders keeping elbows stationary.

name: EZ Bar Curl
instructions: Grip EZ bar on angled portions, curl to shoulders.

name: Preacher Curl
instructions: Rest upper arms on preacher bench, curl bar up, lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Curl
instructions: Curl dumbbells to shoulders, can alternate or do together.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Curl with palms facing each other throughout movement.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
instructions: Lie on incline bench, arms hanging, curl dumbbells up.

name: Concentration Curl
instructions: Sit, brace elbow against inner thigh, curl dumbbell up.

name: Cable Curl
instructions: Stand facing low cable, curl bar up keeping elbows at sides.

name: Cable Hammer Curl
instructions: Use rope attachment, curl with neutral grip.

name: Machine Curl
instructions: Sit with back against pad, curl handles up.

name: Spider Curl
instructions: Lie face down on incline bench, curl dumbbells letting arms hang straight.

name: Close Grip Bench Press
instructions: Grip bar shoulder-width or narrower, lower to chest, press up focusing on triceps.

name: Skull Crusher
instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to forehead by bending elbows, extend back up.

name: Dumbbell Skull Crusher
instructions: Lie on bench, lower dumbbells to sides of head, extend back up.

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Hold one dumbbell overhead with both hands, lower behind head, extend up.

name: Tricep Kickback
instructions: Bent over, upper arm parallel to floor, extend forearm back.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
instructions: Stand facing high cable, push bar down until arms straight, squeeze triceps.

name: Rope Pushdown
instructions: Use rope attachment, push down and spread rope at bottom.

name: Overhead Cable Extension
instructions: Face away from cable, extend arms overhead.

name: Dips (Triceps)
instructions: Keep torso upright on parallel bars, lower and press up.

name: Bench Dip
instructions: Hands on bench behind you, lower body by bending elbows, press up.

name: Diamond Push-Up
instructions: Hands together forming diamond, perform push-up.

name: Machine Tricep Extension
instructions: Sit with back against pad, grip handles, extend arms down.

name: Barbell Squat
instructions: Bar on upper back, feet shoulder-width, squat down until thighs parallel, drive up.

name: Front Squat
instructions: Bar on front delts, elbows high, squat keeping torso upright.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat down between legs, drive up.

name: Dumbbell Squat
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, squat down, drive up.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Rear foot elevated on bench, lower front knee to 90 degrees, drive up.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in machine, press platform away, lower with control.

name: Hack Squat
instructions: Stand in hack squat machine, squat down, drive up.

name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit with back against pad, extend legs, squeeze quads at top.

name: Walking Lunge
instructions: Step forward into lunge, push off front foot to step into next lunge.

name: Reverse Lunge
instructions: Step backward into lunge, lower rear knee toward floor, push back up.

name: Step Up
instructions: Step onto elevated platform, drive through front leg, step down.

name: Sissy Squat
instructions: Hold support, lean back and squat, keeping hips forward.

name: Wall Sit
instructions: Back against wall, slide down until thighs parallel, hold position.

name: Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down, curl pad toward glutes, squeeze hamstrings.

name: Seated Leg Curl
instructions: Sit with pad on back of ankles, curl down, squeeze hamstrings.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hold dumbbells at thighs, hinge at hips, lower along legs.

name: Single Leg Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand on one leg, hinge forward while extending other leg back.

name: Good Morning
instructions: Bar on upper back, hinge at hips keeping legs nearly straight.

name: Nordic Curl
instructions: Kneel with ankles secured, slowly lower torso forward, curl back up.

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back, feet flat, drive hips up, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Upper back on bench, bar over hips, drive hips up, squeeze glutes.

name: Dumbbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Upper back on bench, dumbbell on hips, thrust up.

name: Cable Pull Through
instructions: Face away from low cable, hinge and let cable pull through legs, thrust hips forward.

name: Cable Kickback
instructions: Attach ankle cuff to low cable, kick leg back and up.

name: Glute Kickback Machine
instructions: Stand on platform, kick leg back against pad.

name: Hip Abduction Machine
instructions: Sit in machine, push legs apart against pads.

name: Hip Adduction Machine
instructions: Sit in machine, squeeze legs together against pads.

name: Sumo Squat
instructions: Wide stance, toes out, hold dumbbell between legs, squat down.

name: Standing Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on platform, lower heels, rise up onto toes.

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit with knees under pad, raise heels.

name: Leg Press Calf Raise
instructions: On leg press, place toes on bottom of platform, press through toes.

name: Dumbbell Calf Raise
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, rise onto toes, lower with control.

name: Single Leg Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on one foot, rise onto toes, lower slowly.

name: Donkey Calf Raise
instructions: Bent over with pad on lower back, rise onto toes.

name: Crunch
instructions: Lie on back, hands behind head, curl shoulders toward hips.

name: Reverse Crunch
instructions: Lie on back, bring knees toward chest, lift hips off floor.

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on back, alternate bringing opposite elbow to knee.

name: Leg Raise
instructions: Lie on back, raise straight legs to vertical, lower with control.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs to horizontal or higher.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
instructions: Hang from bar, raise knees toward chest.

name: Plank
instructions: Hold push-up position on forearms, keep body straight.

name: Side Plank
instructions: On side, supported by forearm, keep body straight.

name: Mountain Climber
instructions: In push-up position, alternate driving knees toward chest.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit with torso leaned back, rotate side to side.

name: Cable Crunch
instructions: Kneel facing high cable, crunch down bringing elbows to knees.

name: Cable Woodchop
instructions: Pull cable diagonally across body with rotation.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Kneel, roll wheel forward extending body, pull back to start.

name: Dead Bug
instructions: Lie on back, alternate extending opposite arm and leg.

name: Bird Dog
instructions: On hands and knees, extend opposite arm and leg, hold.

name: Sit-Up
instructions: Lie on back, anchor feet, sit all the way up.

name: V-Up
instructions: Lie flat, simultaneously raise legs and torso to form V.

name: Decline Sit-Up
instructions: On decline bench, anchor feet, sit up against gravity.

name: Machine Crunch
instructions: Sit in machine, crunch forward against resistance.

name: Pallof Press
instructions: Stand perpendicular to cable, press handle straight out, resist rotation.

name: Farmer's Walk
instructions: Hold heavy dumbbells at sides, walk maintaining upright posture.

name: Suitcase Carry
instructions: Hold dumbbell on one side only, walk without leaning.

name: Clean and Jerk
instructions: Pull bar from floor to shoulders, then drive overhead in two movements.

name: Snatch
instructions: Pull bar from floor to overhead in one continuous movement.

name: Clean
instructions: Pull bar from floor to rack position on shoulders.

name: Power Clean
instructions: Clean without full squat, catch in partial squat position.

name: Hang Clean
instructions: Start at hang position, clean bar to shoulders.

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Hinge at hips, swing kettlebell between legs and up to chest height.

name: Kettlebell Clean
instructions: Swing kettlebell from between legs to rack position at shoulder.

name: Kettlebell Snatch
instructions: Swing kettlebell from between legs directly overhead.

name: Turkish Get-Up
instructions: Lie down with kettlebell pressed up, stand up while keeping arm vertical.

name: Thruster
instructions: Front squat into overhead press in one fluid motion.

name: Dumbbell Thruster
instructions: Squat with dumbbells at shoulders, drive up and press overhead.

name: Man Maker
instructions: Push-up, row each arm, jump feet in, clean and press.

name: Burpee
instructions: Squat down, kick back to push-up, push-up, jump feet in, jump up.

name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold kettlebell at chest, squat deep, drive up.

name: Kettlebell Press
instructions: Clean kettlebell to shoulder, press overhead.

name: Kettlebell Row
instructions: Bent over, row kettlebell to hip.

name: Kettlebell Deadlift
instructions: Stand over kettlebell, hinge and grip, drive up.

name: Box Jump
instructions: Jump onto box, step down, repeat.

name: Jump Squat
instructions: Squat down, explode up into jump, land softly.

name: Split Jump
instructions: Lunge position, jump and switch legs in air.

name: Inverted Row
instructions: Hang from bar or rings, pull chest to bar.

name: Pike Push-Up
instructions: Push-up with hips high, lower head toward floor.

name: Handstand Push-Up
instructions: Handstand against wall, lower head to floor, press up.

name: Muscle Up
instructions: Pull-up transitioning over bar into dip position, press up.

name: L-Sit
instructions: Support body on hands, hold legs straight out in front.

name: Toes to Bar
instructions: Hang from bar, raise toes to touch bar.

name: Dragon Flag
instructions: Lie on bench, hold behind head, raise body keeping straight.

name: Landmine Press
instructions: Hold end of barbell at shoulder, press up and out.

name: Landmine Row
instructions: Straddle barbell end, row to chest.

name: Landmine Squat
instructions: Hold barbell end at chest, squat down.

name: Landmine Rotation
instructions: Hold barbell end, rotate side to side.

name: Hip Thrust Machine
instructions: Sit in machine, thrust hips forward against resistance.

name: Belt Squat
instructions: Weight attached to belt, squat without spinal load.

name: Pendulum Squat
instructions: Stand in machine, squat following pendulum path.

name: Smith Machine Squat
instructions: Bar on guided track, squat down.

name: Smith Machine Bench Press
instructions: On bench under Smith machine, press bar up.

name: Smith Machine Shoulder Press
instructions: Seated under Smith machine, press bar overhead.

name: Smith Machine Row
instructions: Bent over, row Smith bar to torso.

name: Chest Dip Machine
instructions: Sit in assisted dip machine, press handles down.

name: Assisted Pull-Up
instructions: Kneel on pad, pull up with assistance.

name: Assisted Dip
instructions: Kneel on pad, dip with assistance.

name: Cable Fly
instructions: Cables at mid height, bring handles together in hugging motion.

name: Low Cable Fly
instructions: Cables low, bring handles up and together.

name: High Cable Fly
instructions: Cables high, bring handles down and together.

name: Cable Bicep Curl (Bar)
instructions: Low cable with bar, curl to shoulders.

name: High Cable Curl
instructions: Cables high, curl handles to ears.

name: Bayesian Curl
instructions: Face away from low cable, curl with arm behind body.

name: Incline Cable Fly
instructions: Incline bench between cables, fly motion.

name: Single Arm Lat Pulldown
instructions: One arm at a time, pull handle to shoulder.

name: Reverse Grip Lat Pulldown
instructions: Underhand grip, pull bar to upper chest.

name: Behind Neck Lat Pulldown
instructions: Pull bar behind neck to upper traps.

name: V-Bar Pulldown
instructions: Use V-bar attachment, pull to chest.

name: Meadows Row
instructions: Stand perpendicular to landmine, row end of bar to hip.

name: Seal Row
instructions: Lie face down on elevated bench, row barbell from hanging position.

name: Kroc Row
instructions: Heavy dumbbell row with some body English allowed.

name: Yates Row
instructions: Underhand grip, more upright torso, row to lower abs.

name: Barbell Pullover
instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar overhead, pull back over chest.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
instructions: Lie across bench, lower dumbbell behind head, pull back over.

name: Cable Pullover
instructions: Face high cable, straight arms, pull bar down to thighs.

name: Zercher Squat
instructions: Hold bar in crook of elbows, squat.

name: Jefferson Squat
instructions: Straddle bar with one foot forward, squat down.

name: Pause Squat
instructions: Regular squat with 2-3 second pause at bottom.

name: Box Squat
instructions: Squat to box, pause briefly, drive up.

name: Safety Bar Squat
instructions: Use safety squat bar, squat with hands on handles.

name: Floor Press
instructions: Lie on floor, press barbell from chest.

name: Spoto Press
instructions: Bench press with pause 1 inch above chest.

name: Close Grip Floor Press
instructions: Floor press with close grip.

name: JM Press
instructions: Hybrid between close grip bench and skull crusher.

name: Pin Press
instructions: Bench press starting from pins at mid-range.

name: Board Press
instructions: Bench press to boards on chest, reducing range of motion.

name: Deficit Deadlift
instructions: Stand on platform, deadlift with increased range of motion.

name: Pause Deadlift
instructions: Deadlift with pause just below knees.

name: Snatch Grip Deadlift
instructions: Wide snatch grip, deadlift with longer range of motion.

name: Trap Bar Deadlift
instructions: Stand inside trap bar, grip handles, lift.

name: Stiff Leg Deadlift
instructions: Deadlift with minimal knee bend throughout.

name: Block Pull
instructions: Deadlift from elevated blocks.

name: Deficit Push-Up
instructions: Hands on raised surfaces, lower chest below hand level.

name: Archer Push-Up
instructions: Wide hands, shift weight to one arm while extending other.

name: Clap Push-Up
instructions: Explosive push-up, clap hands at top.

name: Pseudo Planche Push-Up
instructions: Push-up with hands by hips, lean forward.

name: Wide Grip Pull-Up
instructions: Extra wide grip pull-up.

name: Commando Pull-Up
instructions: Grip bar with hands in line, pull up alternating sides of bar.

name: Typewriter Pull-Up
instructions: Pull up, shift side to side at top.

name: L-Sit Pull-Up
instructions: Hold L-sit position while performing pull-ups.

name: Pistol Squat
instructions: Single leg squat with other leg extended forward.

name: Shrimp Squat
instructions: Single leg squat holding rear foot behind.

name: Cossack Squat
instructions: Wide stance, squat to one side, other leg straight.

name: Hindu Squat
instructions: Squat raising heels, sweep arms.

name: Glute Ham Raise
instructions: On GHD, lower torso and curl back up using hamstrings.

name: Back Extension
instructions: On back extension bench, lower and raise torso.

name: Reverse Hyper
instructions: Lie face down, raise legs behind using glutes.

name: 45 Degree Back Extension
instructions: On 45 degree bench, lower and raise torso.

name: GHD Sit-Up
instructions: On GHD, full range sit-up.

name: Weighted Pull-Up
instructions: Pull-up with added weight via belt or vest.

name: Weighted Dip
instructions: Dip with added weight via belt or vest.

name: Weighted Push-Up
instructions: Push-up with weight plate on back.

name: Zottman Curl
instructions: Curl up with supination, rotate to pronation, lower slowly.

name: Cross Body Hammer Curl
instructions: Hammer curl across body toward opposite shoulder.

name: Drag Curl
instructions: Curl bar up while keeping it against body, elbows back.

name: Waiter Curl
instructions: Hold dumbbell by top plate like serving tray, curl.

name: Reverse Curl
instructions: Overhand grip, curl bar up.

name: Wrist Curl
instructions: Forearms on bench, curl weight with wrists.

name: Reverse Wrist Curl
instructions: Forearms on bench palms down, extend wrists up.

name: Tate Press
instructions: Lie on bench, lower dumbbells to chest with elbows out, extend.

name: French Press
instructions: Seated or standing, lower bar behind head, extend overhead.

name: California Press
instructions: Hybrid of close grip bench and skull crusher.

name: Rolling Tricep Extension
instructions: Skull crusher letting weight roll back, then extend explosively.

name: Single Arm Overhead Extension
instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head, extend.

name: Band Pull Apart
instructions: Hold band in front, pull apart to chest.

name: Lu Raise
instructions: Lateral raise with thumbs up, raise to overhead.

name: Bus Driver
instructions: Hold plate at arms length, rotate like steering wheel.

name: Plate Front Raise
instructions: Hold plate, raise in front to shoulder height.

name: Svend Press
instructions: Press plates together, extend arms forward, return to chest.
